tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visit her for my pregnancy. To be very honest she is such a great human being with so much of patience. I should really say she is an unforgettable person in our life. I was a gestation diabetic patient and in the later pregnancy my baby weight got increased without taking insulin I have controlled the sugar level by diet. My water broke in the midnight and I called the doctor immediately and she told me to come to the hospital and she reached hospital before me (3 AM). My baby weight was 3.7 kg and it was a normal delivery. With this weight mostly the doctors will have only option as C- Section.

I would highly recommend her for any pregnant women as she don't prefer any unwanted medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for our first pregnancy 
She believed in normal delivery even after having GDM. She even makes unconquerable things to happen easily . Would definitely recommend this doctor
Doctor is friendly and she explained the problem. And gave proper medication also. She is well experienced also. Diagnosed correctly.
********* ****** very polite and friendly. Consultations given very clearly.......nice experience. For me in future any problem means definitely I will choose this doctor only.

********* *** ********* *** ***** very patiently answering to all our doubts ...
I recommend this doctor strongly
reply_text: Thank you Shobana. All the best and take care.

review: A very polite *** * ************* Doctor with a lot of patience who could clearly explain all our doubts.

Doctor was very friendly and listened to all our issues., she advised a lot of things with care ……..
